::Shredder::

Flying over Quickstrike and his group, Shredder looks around, trying to spot 
Bobertron. He shruggs. The bot must have left. Shredder turns around to 
leave, but stops as an idea occurrs to him. This was his chance to get back 
at Quickstrike...

He grins evilly, turning back around and looking down at Quickstrike.

"Say goodbye, fuzor," he says quietly, taking out a grenade and throwing it 
down in front of Quickstrike.

Hearing the sound of the explosion, Shredder pulls out his guns, firing down 
at where he threw the grenade.
